resources.cartShippingErrorMsg: Please ensure you have completed all shipping fields and corrected any invalid entries.
resources.zipCodeInvalid: Invalid entry. Please enter a valid zip/postal code.
resources.noShippingMethodsText: There are no shipping methods available for your destination address.
